short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Management of installed google chrome extensions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this extension we can manage all installed chrome extension on single place. We can enable/disable in just one click. Even using this we can uninstall any existing chrome extension.
